message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get 40%. It's a good deal considering the inflation!
Your offer was a bit too greedy Alice. How about a more balanced split this time? I take 55% and you get 45%.
That's not much better than your last offer, Bob. I'm confident I can get a better deal if we keep playing.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take 55% and you get 45%.  We should settle this before inflation eats away at our potential winnings.
